name: Paris-Dakar famicom tribute - Retro Racer
description:
My tribute to Paris Dakar rally for the famicom

Release of a 6 level racing game.

Also included is my tribute edits of the cover art for the original game and 

Paris-Dakar Rally Special! is an unusual racing game on the famicom in which the player must successfully win the Paris-Dakar Rally. However, in order to do so, the player is faced with a wide variety of odd challenges to overcome, a scant number of which actually involve racing.

Developed by ISCO for the NES, Paris-Dakar Rally is notorious for its bizarre structure. Depending on who is asked it is either a testament to the NES library's occasionally creative and off-beat ingenuity, or a legendary "kusoge" (rubbish game).

http://www.gamingcx.com/2012/08/gamecenter-cx-episode-107-paris-dakar.html

Dezaemon BS-X - Paris Dakar Rally Special is a rom hack of Dezaemon SFC for the Super Nintendo.
